name: Gynblyr
description:
IF WEBGL HANGS ON LOAD: just download the windows or mac version whaddya gonna do

wasd: move

shift: sprint

e: grab (destroys current weapon)

g: drop current weapon

space: jump/ jetpack (in air)

r: restart

left click: shoot

right click: zoom

Survive as long as possible. Weapons drop from the sky. Chromatic aberration represents proximity to death.

I realize this game doesn't have too much polish and its not super finished but I think this is the most I'm gonna work on it haha because I wanna finish my other projects too. 

whatcha think :)
